subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN1634 is on the way
description_text:
Hello,

You send my order last week, but there is a problem with it being 
oversize/overweight.
Would you be so kind to look into that?

Kind regards,
Mattijs

conversations.body_text: Hi Mattijs van der Aa,    Okay, we have processed the order for you and we will reship it for you and will send you a logistics update once it is shipped.
